docs.lead_paragraph: The Board of Health report thirteen new cases of Cholera, and eight deaths, for the twenty-four hours ending at 4 P. M. Two of the deaths, however, should have been reported yesterday. The weather to-day has been warm and pleasant.
docs.snippet: The Board of Health report thirteen new cases of Cholera, and eight deaths, for the twenty-four hours ending at 4 P. M. Two of the deaths, however, should have been reported yesterday. The weather to-day has been warm and pleasant.
